courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the R Programming - R Programming Language Beginners to Pro course! Whether you're a complete novice or an experienced programmer looking to expand your skills, this comprehensive course is designed to take you from beginner to proficient user in R programming.


Dive into the fundamental syntax of R programming, including variables, data types (numeric, character, logical), vectors, and basic operations. Learn how to write and execute R code in the RStudio console. Explore R's essential data structures, including vectors, matrices, arrays, lists, and data frames. Understand how to create, manipulate, and access elements in each data structure.


R is a powerful and versatile programming language widely used for statistical computing, data analysis, and visualization. In this course, you'll learn everything you need to know to harness the full potential of R, from basic concepts to advanced techniques.


Here's an overview of what you can expect to learn:


  • Comments

  • Operators

  • For Loop

  • Functions

  • Lists

  • Arrays

End of this course, you'll have the skills and confidence to tackle data analysis, visualization, and statistical modeling tasks using R, positioning yourself as a proficient R programmer. courseDetails.title: Advertising Strategy Fundamentals: Upskill to Drive Growth
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Effective Advertising Strategies: Simplify, Humanize and Optimize Your Campaigns
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Advertising Strategy Fundamentals: Upskill to Drive Business Growth" a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the essential skills to create effective advertising strategies that resonate with your audience and drive business growth. Whether you're a marketer, product manager, CMO, business owner, direct seller, freelancer, entrepreneur, business coach, or startup founder, this course will provide you with actionable insights and practical frameworks to elevate your advertising efforts.

What You'll Achieve

  • Clarify What Advertising Strategy Is and Is Not: Uncover the common misconceptions about advertising strategy and learn what truly makes a strategy effective. This foundational knowledge will help you avoid common pitfalls and focus on what really matters.

  • Answer Six Fundamental Questions: Discover the key questions that every successful advertising strategy must address. These questions will guide your thinking and help you develop a robust strategy that aligns with your business goals.

  • Insights from Top Brands: Learn from the advertising strategies of renowned brands like Apple, Snickers, and Dove. Understand the secrets behind their successful campaigns and how you can apply these lessons to your own efforts.

  • Simplify and Humanize Your Strategy: Develop strategies that connect with people on an emotional level. By turning complex concepts into simple, memorable steps, you’ll be able to create campaigns that resonate with your audience.

  • Develop a Framework for Success: Create a roadmap that guides you in crafting campaigns that are perfectly aligned with your brand’s identity and goals. This framework will serve as your blueprint for success.

  • The Power of Emotion: Understand how emotions drive decisions and behavior. Learn how to leverage this understanding in your advertising efforts to create campaigns that not only attract attention but also drive action.

Course Benefits

By the end of this course, you will:

  • Improve Your Advertising Skills: Learn new strategies that are teachable, learnable, and applicable. These skills will help you create more effective and impactful advertising campaigns.

  • Become More Productive: Implement efficient strategies that maximize your marketing efforts. Learn how to work smarter, not harder, and achieve better results with less effort.

  • Solve Business Problems: Develop campaigns that address and solve real business challenges. Whether you're struggling with low engagement or unclear messaging, this course will help you find effective solutions.

  • Advance Your Career: Gain the knowledge and skills that can help you secure a promotion or new role. Enhance your resume and stand out in the competitive job market.

Course Structure

1. Introduction to Advertising Strategy

  • Overview of what advertising strategy is and isn’t: Gain a clear understanding of the true meaning of advertising strategy and why it’s essential for business growth.

  • The importance of a clear and actionable strategy: Learn why a well-defined strategy is crucial for the success of your advertising efforts.

2. Defining the Strategic Challenge

  • Learn how to identify and define your business problem: Discover the steps to pinpointing the real issues that need addressing in your strategy.

  • Explore examples from top brands: See how successful companies like Apple, Dove, and Nike have tackled their strategic challenges.

  • Special Video on AI Tools: Discover AI tools that help in identifying and defining business problems.

3. Sizing and Defining Your Key Audience Groups

  • Explore advanced audience segmentation techniques to identify and understand your target market.

  • Special Video on AI Tools: Discover segmentation tools to better understand and reach your audience.

4. The Insights (Three Truths Framework)

  • Understand the 'Truth Individuals Share,' 'Truth of the Moment,' and 'Truth of the Brand': Learn how to integrate these truths into your strategy to connect with your audience.

  • How to apply the Three Truths framework: Use practical exercises and real-world examples to master this powerful strategy tool.

  • Special Video on AI Tools: Use digital tools to derive insights from customer feedback.

5. Developing a Measurement Strategy

  • Setting up KPIs and tactical measures to track progress: Learn how to establish clear metrics that align with your business goals.

  • Embracing a Test & Learn approach to refine your strategies: Understand the importance of continuous improvement and how to implement it in your campaigns.

  • Special Video on AI Tools: Utilize tools to measure and analyze campaign performance effectively.

6. Optimizing Campaigns

  • Pre-campaign planning and the importance of setting the stage: Understand the steps to take before launching your campaign to ensure its success.

  • Real-time optimization and making data-driven adjustments: Learn how to use data to make informed decisions and improve your campaign’s performance on the fly.

  • Special Video on AI Tools: Learn about tools that help you optimize and refine your strategies.

Case Studies and Real-World Applications

  • In-depth analysis of successful campaigns from Apple, Snickers, Nike, and more: Gain insights into what made these campaigns successful and how you can apply these lessons to your own efforts.

  • Key takeaways and how to apply them to your own advertising efforts: Learn actionable steps that you can implement immediately to improve your campaigns.


Join us in "Advertising Strategy Fundamentals: Upskill to Drive Business Growth" and take the first step towards mastering the art of advertising strategy. Enroll now and start transforming your advertising approach today!

This course is designed to provide you with the skills and knowledge you need to develop and execute effective advertising strategies. With practical insights, real-world examples, and actionable steps, you’ll be well-equipped to drive business growth and achieve your marketing goals.

courseDetails.title: Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management using Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Retail analytics using MS Excel - Covering Forecasting, Market Basket, RFM, Customer Valuation & Price Bundling
courseDetails.longDescription:
You're looking for a complete course on understanding Marketing Analytics and Retail Business Management to drive business decisions involving production schedules, inventory management, promotional mail optimization, store layouting, estimating right bundle price, customer valuation and many other parts of the business., right?

You've found the right Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management course! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different forecasting models, Market Basket analysis, conducting market research, marketing analytics, RFM (recency, frequency, monetary) analysis, Customer Valuation methods & Price Bundling analysis and how to implement these models in Excel using advanced excel tool.

After completing this course you will be able to:

  • Implement forecasting models such as simple linear, simple multiple regression, Additive and multiplicative trend and seasonality model and many more, required for devising marketing analytics strategies effectively.

  • Perform marketing analytics and market basket analysis and calculate lift to derive a store layout that maximizes sales from complementary products.

  • Do RFM (Recency, frequency, and monetary value) analysis to help you maximize profit from promotional mail campaigns.

  • Increase revenue/profit of your firm by implementing revenue / profit maximizing bundle price point using marketing analytics tool like Excel solver Add-in

  • Understand the value of your customers to make intelligent decisions based on recommendations of marketing analytics and marketing research on how to spend money acquiring them

  • Confidently practice, discuss and understand different marketing analytics models used by organizations

How this course will help you?

A Verifiable Certificate of Completion is presented to all students who undertake this Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management course.

If you are a business manager or an executive, or a student who wants to learn and apply forecasting models, marketing analytics techniques based on marketing research in real world problems of business, this course will give you a solid base for that by teaching you the most popular forecasting models and marketing analytics strategies and how to implement them.

Why should you choose this course?

We believe in teaching by example. This course is no exception. Every Section’s primary focus is to teach you the concepts of marketing analytics, marketing research through how-to examples. Each section has the following components:

  • Theoretical concepts and cases of different forecasting models and marketing analytics techniques

  • Step-by-step instructions on implementing forecasting models and marketing analytics in excel

  • Downloadable Excel file containing data and solutions used in each lecture on marketing analytics and retail business management

  • Class notes and assignments to revise and practice the concepts on marketing analytics and retail business management

The practical classes where we create the model for each of these strategies is something which differentiates this course from any other course available online.

What makes us qualified to teach you?

The course is taught by Abhishek and Pukhraj. As managers in Global Analytics Consulting firm, we have helped businesses solve their business problem using Analytics and we have used our experience to include the practical aspects of Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques and data analytics in this course.

We are also the creators of some of the most popular online courses - with over 170,000 enrollments and thousands of 5-star reviews like these ones:

This is very good, i love the fact the all explanation given can be understood by a layman - Joshua

Thank you Author for this wonderful course. You are the best and this course is worth any price. - Daisy

Our Promise

Teaching our students is our job and we are committed to it. If you have any questions about the course content, marketing analytics, marketing research, practice sheet or anything related to any topic, you can always post a question in the course or send us a direct message.

Download Practice files, take Quizzes, and complete Assignments

With each lecture, there are class notes attached for you to follow along. You can also take quizzes to check your understanding of concepts on Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques. Each section contains a practice assignment for you to practically implement your learning on Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques.

What is covered in this course?

Understanding how future sales will change is one of the key information needed by manager to take data driven decisions. In this course, we will explore how one can use marketing analytics tools and forecasting models to

  • See patterns in time series data

  • Make forecasts based on models

Let me give you a brief overview of the course

  • Section 1 - Introduction

    In this section we will learn about the course structure containing Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques.

  • Section 2 - Basics of Forecasting

    In this section, we will discuss about the basic of forecasting and we will also learn the easiest way to create simple linear regression model in Excel

  • Section 3 - Getting Data Ready for Regression Model

    In this section you will learn what actions you need to take step by step to get the data and then prepare it for the marketing analytics purpose. These steps are very important.

    We start with understanding the importance of business knowledge then we will see how to do data exploration. We learn how to do uni-variate analysis and bi-variate analysis then we cover topics like outlier treatment and missing value imputation. These are the building blocks of implementing marketing analytics techniques effectively.

  • Section 4 - Forecasting using Regression Model

    This section starts with simple linear regression and then covers multiple linear regression. We have covered the basic theory behind each concept without getting too mathematical about it so that you understand where the concept is coming from and how it is important. But even if you don't understand it, it will be okay as long as you learn how to run and interpret the result as taught in the practical lectures.

    We also look at how to quantify models accuracy, what is the meaning of F statistic, how categorical variables in the independent variables data set are interpreted in the results.

  • Section 5 - Handling Special events like Holiday sales

    In this section we will learn how to incorporate effects of Day of Week Effect, Month Effect or any special event such Holidays, pay day etc.

  • Section 6 - Identifying Seasonality & Trend for Forecasting

    In this section we will learn about trends and seasonality and how to use the Solver to develop an additive or multiplicative model to estimate trends and seasonality. We will also learn how to use moving averages to eliminate seasonality to easily see trends in sales.

  • Section 7 - Market Basket Analysis and Lift

    In this section we will learn about Marketing analytics, marketing research, market basket analysis and learn how to calculate lift to derive a store layout that maximizes sales from complementary products.

  • Section 8 - Recency, frequency, and monetary value analysis

    In this section we will learn techniques to perform RFM (Recency, frequency, and monetary value) analysis to help you maximize profit from promotional mail campaigns.

  • Section 9 - Recency, frequency, and monetary value analysis

    In this section we will learn price bundling techniques and learn how to increase revenue/profit of your firm by implementing revenue / profit maximizing price point using Excel solver Add-in

  • Section 10 - Recency, frequency, and monetary value analysis

    In this section, we will discuss about the basic of concepts of Customer Lifetime value and learn how to create excel model to find lifetime customer value and perform sensitivity analysis to capture variations in lifetime value under different scenarios.

  • Section 11 - Excel crash course

    If you're new to Excel, or you've played around with it but want to get more comfortable with Excel's advanced features required for this course. Either way, this section will be great for you to revise your rusty excel skills .

Some of the examples in this course are from the book Marketing Analytics: Data-Driven Techniques with Microsoft Excel [Winston, Wayne L.]. We suggest this book as reading material for anyone aspiring to be a marketing analyst and gaining knowledge on Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques and data analytics.

I am pretty confident that the course will give you the necessary knowledge and skills related to Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques, to immediately see practical benefits in your workplace.

Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1 of this Marketing Analytics course!

Cheers

courseDetails.title: Ethically Hack the Planet Part 2

"Ethically Hack the Planet Part 2" is an advanced cybersecurity course that delves into the intricacies of network penetration testing and ethical hacking. Building upon the foundational knowledge gained in Part 1, this course extends the understanding of cybersecurity concepts to a deeper level. One of the core components of the course is the exploration and practical use of Metasploitable 2, a purposely vulnerable virtual machine that provides a safe environment for hands-on learning and experimentation.

The course covers essential techniques such as network scanning to identify IP addresses within a network. Students learn about banner grabbing, a method to gather information about a target system, including the operating system, software versions, and more. Understanding port numbers and their associated services is a crucial aspect of the course, particularly focusing on commonly exploited ports like FTP (Port 21), SSH (Port 22), Telnet (Port 23), SMTP (Port 25), HTTP (Port 80), and ports 139, 445, and 1099.

FTP, SSH, Telnet, SMTP, and HTTP are explored in detail, discussing their functionalities, vulnerabilities, and potential security risks. Practical exercises involve utilizing ethical hacking techniques to assess and secure these services, thereby preparing students to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities in real-world scenarios.

By the end of "Ethically Hack the Planet Part 2," participants will have a comprehensive understanding of network security, ethical hacking methodologies, and the tools necessary to assess and fortify network infrastructures against potential cyber threats. The course empowers individuals to use their knowledge and skills for constructive purposes, promoting a safer and more secure digital landscape."

Etes-vous prêt à démarrer chaque journée avec un allié, un assistant personnel extrêmement doué, prêt à accomplir vos tâches avec une précision et une rapidité inégalée. Une IA capable de rédiger vos mails, articles ou rapports, de créer des images inspirantes, d'analyser des données complexes, de coder des solutions sur mesure et de résoudre une multitude de problèmes, vous permettant ainsi de vous concentrer sur ce qui compte vraiment.


Pour tirer tous ces bénéfices de l’IA encore faut-il la maîtriser. Beaucoup de personnes s’enthousiasment, réalisent 2 ou 3 prompts et finissent par abandonner le sujet sans découvrir le vrai potentiel de l’intelligence artificielle. Derrière ce comportement se cache souvent une méconnaissance des techniques, méthodes, paramétrages qui permettent d’obtenir les meilleurs résultats avec l’intelligence artificielle.


Le but de cette formation c’est donc de vous donner toutes les clés pour communiquer efficacement avec l’IA, la paramétrer au mieux et l’exploiter pleinement.


Et pour y parvenir, j’ai conçu un parcours concis et dynamique qui vous permettra de développer les connaissances et compétences essentielles à l’utilisation optimisée de l’IA.

Au cours de cette formation, nous verrons ensemble :

- Comment formuler des requêtes claires à l’IA pour obtenir les meilleures réponses possibles

- Comment configurer ChatGPT pour qu'il devienne votre professeur, co-fondateur ou analyste de confiance.

- Comment générer de multiples idées et devenir meilleur dans votre travail, plus productif, plus rapide, plus pertinent et efficace.

- Comment profiter pleinement de la multimodalité de ChatGPT pour lui écrire, lui parler, l’écouter, lui transmettre des images et lui demander de les interpréter.

- Comment pousser Dall-e ou Copilot à générer les meilleures images possibles.

- Comment trouver des alternatives intéressantes à la version payante de ChatGPT.

- On va également explorer d’autres IA comme Copilot, Claude ou Gemini.

- On verra comment adapter ChatGPT à vos préférences et besoins spécifiques pour des réponses sur mesure.

- On va voir comment booster ChatGPT grâce aux GPTs : comment utiliser ces applications et même comment les créer sans être développeur.

- On va aussi explorer des sujets un peu plus techniques en fin de formation comme la gestion des API, le playground, l’intégration de ChatGPT sur d’autres logiciels comme Excel ou Google sheets par exemple.

- Et surtout on verra que tout ça est accessible à tous, même aux débutants.


Dans cette formation, vous trouverez :

  • Des démonstrations concrètes.

  • Des fiches techniques et guides pratiques téléchargeables.

  • Et surtout un contenu régulièrement mis à jour


En bref, vous vous apprêtez à suivre un cours clair, accessible et engageant. Assez détaillé pour couvrir les notions essentielles sans traîner en longueur. Peu importe votre niveau de départ que vous soyez débutant ou à la recherche de techniques avancées, c’est la seule formation dont vous aurez besoin pour maîtriser ChatGPT.


Qui suis-je ?

Je m’appelle Yassine Rochd, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation qui a aidé des milliers d’apprenants à atteindre leurs objectifs professionnels.

Je suis également passionné par la technologie. Après un master en finance et des expériences en conseil et en fonds d’investissement, j'ai suivi une formation en développement web et passé des centaines d’heures à découvrir et utiliser des IA.

Aujourd’hui, je souhaite vous transmettre le plus clairement possible ce que j’ai appris ces dernières années.


Certification et garantie :

- En terminant cette formation, vous recevrez une certification que vous pourrez même partager sur LinkedIn.

- Cette formation est également sans risque puisque vous bénéficiez d’une garantie « satisfait ou remboursé » de 30 jours.

- Vous bénéficiez d’un accès à vie à la formation, aux ressources téléchargeables et aux futures mises à jour


Vous êtes à un clic de maîtriser une technologie extrêmement utile qui vous rendra plus efficace, plus productif, et tout simplement incontournable.



Détail des différentes sections de ce cours sur ChatGPT et l'IA :


I. Prise en main rapide de ChatGPT

Découvrez comment maîtriser rapidement ChatGPT en seulement quelques vidéos. Plongez dans l'interface intuitive de ChatGPT et apprenez à créer vos premiers prompts pour exploiter pleinement la puissance de l'IA. Que ce soit pour générer des tableaux, brainstormer, générer des idées, traduire et corriger des textes, ou encore rédiger des contenus variés, vous irez plus vite et serez plus performant avec l’IA. Découvrez comment ChatGPT peut vous assister dans votre recherche d'emploi et s'adapter à vos besoins professionnels pour accroître votre efficacité. Vous verrez que ChatGPT est capable de créer une multitude de contenus, allant des mails et lettres aux articles et posts pour les réseaux sociaux, sans oublier la rédaction de code informatique.


II. Les bases du prompt engineering

Apprenez pourquoi le prompt engineering est essentiel et comment il peut transformer ChatGPT en véritable expert. Comprenez l'importance du contexte et des objectifs pour structurer vos interactions, et découvrez comment ajuster le format et la température pour optimiser vos prompts et varier le niveau de créativité du modèle. Personnalisez vos interactions en maîtrisant le ton et le style, et bénéficiez de 5 conseils pratiques pour obtenir des réponses encore plus pertinentes de ChatGPT.

III. techniques avancées de prompt engineering

Dans cette section, on verra comment créer des prompts qui génèrent eux-mêmes d'autres prompts. On étudiera la méthode du reverse engineering, les fonctionnalités de recherche web, d’interprétation d’images et encore plein d’autres techniques avancées.


IV. Dall-e

On enchainera sur la génération d’images avec Dall-e. Vous verrez comment passer d’un résultat très moyen à des œuvres esthétiques et inspirantes, comment modifier simplement et rapidement des portions d'images et optimiser vos résultats. On étudiera également des techniques avancées qui vous permettront par exemple de créer une continuité dans la génération d’un personnage de fiction ou de bande dessinée, pour des résultats encore plus impressionnants.


V. Les solutions aux limites de ChatGPT et de l’IA

ChatGPT et les autres modèles d’intelligence artificielle présentent des limites et des faiblesses. On verra dans cette section quelles sont-elles et comment les surmonter.


VI. Fonctionnalités intéressantes sur ChatGPT

Apprenez à paramétrer les fonctionnalités de partage de vos conversations pour une utilisation collaborative de ChatGPT. Exploitez au mieux l’application mobile Chat GPT, en explorant toutes les options qu'elle offre. Enfin, découvrez les méthodes pour créer un contenu unique avec l’IA en évitant toute forme de plagiat ou contenu dupliqué.


VII. Copilot et Bing

Copilot propose plusieurs alternatives intéressantes à des fonctionnalités payantes et avancées de ChatGPT. On verra comment profiter du partenariat entre Microsoft et OpenAI pour accéder à des fonctionnalités avancées d’intelligence artificielle intégrées au moteur de recherche Bing.


VIII. Gemini, Claude, Mistral et les autres

Dans la continuité de la section précédente, on étudiera d’autres IA comme Gemini de Google ou Claude d’Anthropique. On verra leur force, leur faiblesse et on étudiera plusieurs cas d’utilisation pour savoir dans quel cas les préférer à ChatGPT.


IX. Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Adaptez ChatGPT à vos besoins et à vos attentes. Apprenez à personnaliser vos interactions en configurant vos custom instructions. Découvrez également les points de vigilance à considérer pour une utilisation optimale.


X. Les GPTs

Découvrez le fonctionnement des GPTs, ces mini applications hyperspécialisées qui peuvent parfois dépasser ChatGPT. Apprenez à créer votre propre GPT étape par étape. Maîtrisez les appels d’API pour maximiser les capacités de ChatGPT et découvrez même en fin de section comment monétiser vos GPTs et, plus largement, comment gagner de l'argent grâce à ChatGPT.


XI. Gestion d’API & Playground

Explorez le playground de ChatGPT et découvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalités qu'il offre. Apprenez à appeler l'API de ChatGPT avec des niveaux de difficulté croissants. Vous pourrez ainsi utiliser ChatGPT en dehors de l'interface, créer un chatbot sur un autre site ou même intégrer ChatGPT à d'autres logiciels comme Google Sheets ou Excel, par exemple.
targetAudiences: Toute personne souhaitant maîtriser l'IA et ChatGPT. Cette formation est tout niveau.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Secure the world
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you fascinated by the world of ethical hacking and cybersecurity? Ready to take your skills to the next level? Join us for Ethically Hack the Planet Part 3, an advanced course designed to equip you with the knowledge and techniques needed to become a proficient ethical hacker.


In this comprehensive course, we will delve deep into various ethical hacking topics, focusing on advanced techniques and tools. You will learn essential skills such as:

Spoofing a Mac Address: Understand the art of disguising your device's identity and bypassing network security measures.

Bypass Windows Passwords: Gain expertise in breaking into Windows systems securely, a crucial skill for ethical hackers.

Sniffing: Explore the concept of network packet sniffing to capture and analyze data flowing through networks.

HTTrack Web Site Copier: Learn how to clone websites for penetration testing and research purposes.

Mac Flooding Attack: Master the technique of overwhelming a network switch to disrupt network connectivity.

Honeypots: Discover the types of honeypots and practical applications for setting up these decoy systems to lure potential attackers.

Deep Web and Dark Web: Understand the distinction between these hidden corners of the internet, and explore their significance in cybersecurity.

Creating Your Own Tor Website: Explore the world of onion services and learn to host websites anonymously on the Tor network.

ExifTool: Harness the power of information gathering through metadata extraction from files.

Webcam Hacking: Gain insight into ethical methods of accessing webcams for security assessment.

Email Footprinting: Learn techniques for tracing email origins and understanding sender behavior.

Whonix: Discover how to fully anonymize your Kali Linux system using Whonix for secure ethical hacking operations.

Keyloggers: Explore the use of keyloggers for monitoring and analyzing user activity.

Finding Social Media Accounts by Usernames: Learn advanced OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) techniques to uncover online profiles.

Junior SOC Analyst Lab: Put your skills to the test in a hands-on lab designed to simulate real-world security operations.


By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of advanced ethical hacking techniques and be well-prepared to tackle complex security challenges in an ethical and responsible manner. courseDetails.title: Financial Modeling on Excel Complete finance course on Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Financial Modeling practical case and training on Excel - Business Plan, Valuation, and Financial Modeling on Excel
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you are interested in finance careers, such as Private Equity, M&A, financial controling or financial management, you've likely realized that one key skill is indispensable across all these finance fields: it's financial modeling.

Financial modeling is the cornerstone of finance, underpinning essential tasks such as developing Business Plans, generating reports in Excel, and valuing companies. The ability to create reliable and well-structured financial models is therefore crucial if you aim to pursue a career in corporate finance.

This is why many job interviews include technical cases on Excel. Within 30 minutes to an hour, employers can assess candidates by providing them with a computer and specific instructions, effectively identifying the top 10% who excel in financial modeling.

This comprehensive finance course on Excel will provide you with the knowledge, techniques, and best practices to create clear, well-structured models that meet the high standards of investment banks, Private Equity firms and financial management teams.

In this training, you will learn the standards and rules of financial modeling to produce professional, rigorous, optimized, and error-free outputs. You will be guided through designing a complete financial model with various investment and development scenarios for a company, including a debt schedule with multiple financing tranches, a Sources and Uses table, a clear Business Plan, and valuation using the transaction comparables method based on a normative EBITDA. Finally, we will calculate the IRR and analyze it according to investment exit parameters.

If these concepts are unfamiliar to you, we will cover them before diving into financial modeling in Excel. This course revisits essential finance fundamentals and the necessary knowledge you must master if you are interested in financial controlling, financial analysis, or transactional careers (PE, M&A, TS).

Instructor Introduction:

My name is Yassine, and I am the founder of a corporate finance training organization that has helped thousands of students and recent graduates prepare for interviews in Private Equity, investment banking, and consulting firms in Transaction Services, Valuation, and Financial Restructuring.

I am also a former Associate in Private Equity, having worked for two years in two different investment funds in Paris on small-cap operations across various sectors, including hospitality and real estate, tech and media, and renewable energy.

Additionally, I was a senior consultant in Valuation and Financial Modeling at EY, where I worked on multiple financial models in transactional contexts and investment projects.
targetAudiences: Finance students who are interested in highly competitive areas of corporate finance such as Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valuation, and, of course, financial modeling
Candidates for an interview in finance who want to practice and prepare for Excel-based financial modeling cases
Corporate finance interns seeking to enhance their skills in finance, financial modeling and Excel
Junior analysts in corporate finance
Senior finance analysts who aim to enhance their proficiency in financial modeling using Excel

courseDetails.title: Metasploit from Scratch: Beginner to Professional
courseDetails.shortDescription: Metasploit from Scratch: Beginner to Professional - Master Penetration Testing and Exploitation Techniques
courseDetails.longDescription:
Metasploit from Scratch: Beginner to Professional - Master Penetration Testing and Exploitation Techniques" is a comprehensive course designed to take you from the basics of the Metasploit framework to advanced exploitation and testing techniques. This course is perfect for aspiring cybersecurity professionals, IT administrators, and ethical hackers looking to expand their skill set.

Introduction We begin with an introduction to Metasploit, covering its purpose, capabilities, and role in penetration testing. You'll gain a solid understanding of how Metasploit fits into the broader context of cybersecurity.

Installing and Configuring Metasploit Framework Next, we'll guide you through the installation and configuration of the Metasploit framework on various operating systems. You'll learn the essential steps to get Metasploit up and running, ensuring you're ready to dive into hands-on testing.

Creating and Managing Workspaces Organizing your projects is crucial for effective penetration testing. This section covers creating and managing workspaces, allowing you to keep your tasks structured and efficient.

Using msfconsole You'll become proficient with msfconsole, the command-line interface of Metasploit. Learn how to navigate the interface, execute commands, and customize your environment to streamline your workflow.

Port Scanning and Enumeration Discover how to perform detailed network scanning and enumeration. Using tools like Nmap within Metasploit, you'll identify open ports, services, and potential vulnerabilities in your target systems.

Auxiliary Modules Explore the extensive range of auxiliary modules available in Metasploit. You'll learn how to use these modules for various purposes, including scanning, denial of service, and information gathering.

Vulnerability Scanning Gain expertise in vulnerability scanning using Metasploit. Integrate third-party tools such as Nessus and OpenVAS to enhance your scanning capabilities and interpret the results to identify critical weaknesses.

Windows Testing Focus on Windows systems by setting up a testing lab, exploiting vulnerabilities, and performing post-exploitation tasks. You'll learn about privilege escalation and how to secure Windows environments.

Linux Testing Similarly, you'll delve into Linux testing, understanding the nuances of Linux vulnerabilities and how to exploit them. Post-exploitation techniques and privilege escalation on Linux will be thoroughly covered.

By the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive understanding of Metasploit and its applications in penetration testing across various platforms. You'll be equipped with the skills to identify, exploit, and mitigate vulnerabilities, making you a valuable asset in the field of cybersecurity. Join us on this journey to become a Metasploit professional!

courseDetails.title: Complete Beginners Trading Strategy For Passive Income
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to Swing Trade, a Successful Forex and Stock Trading Style Followed by a Technical Analysis-Based Trading Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Swing trading is a kind of trading in which gains are sought over a few days to several weeks in a stock (or any other financial asset). Technical analysis is the main tool used by swing traders to find trading opportunities.


  • Swing trading is the practise of entering positions that can last from a few days to many months in an effort to capitalise on an expected price movement.

  • A trader who engages in swing trading is exposed to overnight and weekend risk, where the price may gap and start the next session at a significantly different price.

  • The only methodology used in this swing trading course is a very potent Price Action methodology, along with the required position management strategies.

Swing trading usually includes maintaining a long or short position for more than one trading session, although typically not for more than a few weeks or a few months. This is just a basic time range; even though some deals may extend for several months or more, the trader may still classify them as swing trades. Swing trades can also happen during a trading session, but this is an uncommon result caused by incredibly volatile circumstances.


THIS COURSE IS INTENDED FOR THOSE INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE PREPARED TO FINISH IT, AND, IMPLEMENT WHAT THEY HAVE LEARNED

REGARDS,
targetAudiences: This course is exclusively for newbies who want to learn swing trading.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you looking for a powerful and versatile tool to enhance your research capabilities? This course is your gateway to mastering Python for scientific research, where you'll learn through real-world examples across various fields.

As an Assistant Professor of Remote Sensing and a Senior GBD Collaborator with over a decade of experience in Python, R programming, and Big Data, I am excited to guide you on this journey. With a Ph.D. in Geography (Remote Sensing) and over 60 peer-reviewed publications, I bring extensive expertise in data analysis, remote sensing, and climate studies to help you excel.

In this course, you'll gain hands-on experience in:

  • Data Manipulation: Learn to import, export, and manipulate data efficiently using Python.

  • Statistical Analysis: Master techniques like descriptive statistics, multi-correlation, ANOVA, and t-tests.

  • Graph Creation: Create basic, advanced, and animated graphs to visualize your research findings.

This course is designed to not only make you proficient in Python but also empower you to use your creativity in data processing and analysis. Unlike restrictive software like SPSS or Excel, Python offers unlimited possibilities, allowing you to tailor your research tools to your specific needs.

Each lecture is crafted to provide you with actionable insights that you can apply immediately in your research. By the end of the course, you’ll be able to confidently use Jupyter Notebook for scientific research and develop custom Python scripts to tackle complex research challenges.

Take the first step towards elevating your research with Python. Enroll today, and let's unlock the full potential of your research capabilities together.

Sincerely,

Assist. Prof. Azad Rasul
targetAudiences: Researchers and students who are attempting to efficiently use Python programming for their scientific research.

courseDetails.title: Finansal modelleme: Excel'de eksiksiz finans kursu

Eğitim boyunca, finansal modelleme standartları ve profesyonel sonuçlar elde etmek için izlenmesi gereken kurallar hakkında bilgi edineceksiniz. Ayrıca, IRR hesaplamasını yapacak ve yatırım çıkış parametrelerine göre duyarlılık analizi gerçekleştireceğiz.

Bu kurs, özel sermaye, M&A, işlem hizmetleri gibi finansal kontrol, analiz veya işlemsel kariyerlere ilgi duyanlar için finans alanında uzmanlaşmanız gereken temel bilgileri kapsamaktadır.

Excel tabanlı finansal modelleme vakaları için pratik yapmak ve mülakatlara hazırlanmak isteyen finans alanında iş arayan adaylar.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA Generativa: guía de IA y prompt engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina la IA y el Prompt engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | El curso esencial de IA generativa
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formación Integral en ChatGPT e IA Generativa

¿Te imaginas empezar cada día con un asistente personal sumamente talentoso, listo para ejecutar tus tareas con una precisión y rapidez insuperables?

Una IA que puede redactar tus correos, artículos o informes, crear imágenes inspiradoras, analizar datos complejos, programar soluciones a medida y resolver innumerables problemas, permitiéndote enfocarte en lo que realmente importa.

Para disfrutar de todos estos beneficios, primero hay que dominar la IA. Muchas personas se entusiasman, realizan un par de comandos y abandonan, sin llegar a descubrir el verdadero potencial de la inteligencia artificial. Este comportamiento suele deberse a la falta de conocimiento sobre las técnicas, métodos y configuraciones que permiten obtener los mejores resultados.

El objetivo de esta formación es proporcionarte todas las herramientas para comunicarte eficazmente con la IA, configurarla de la mejor manera y explotarla al máximo. Para lograrlo, he diseñado un curso conciso y dinámico que te permitirá desarrollar los conocimientos y habilidades esenciales para un uso óptimo de la IA.


Durante esta formación, aprenderás:

  • Formulación de solicitudes claras a la IA: Cómo redactar peticiones precisas para obtener las mejores respuestas posibles.

  • Configuración de ChatGPT: Convertir ChatGPT en tu profesor, cofundador o analista de confianza.

  • Generación de ideas y productividad: Técnicas para generar múltiples ideas y mejorar tu trabajo, aumentando tu productividad, velocidad, relevancia y eficacia.

  • Aprovechamiento de la multimodalidad de ChatGPT: Cómo escribirle, hablarle, escucharlo, enviarle imágenes y pedirle que las interprete.

  • Generación de imágenes con Dall-e y Copilot: Estrategias para obtener las mejores imágenes posibles.

  • Alternativas a la versión de pago de ChatGPT: Cómo encontrar y utilizar opciones interesantes.

  • Exploración de otras IA: Conocer y utilizar otras herramientas como Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Adaptación de ChatGPT a tus necesidades: Personalizar ChatGPT según tus preferencias y necesidades específicas para obtener respuestas a medida.

  • Potenciación de ChatGPT con los GPTs: Uso de aplicaciones GPT y creación de estas, incluso sin ser desarrollador.

  • Temas técnicos avanzados: Gestión de API, uso del playground, e integración de ChatGPT en otros software como Excel o Google Sheets.

  • Accesibilidad para todos: Todo el contenido está diseñado para ser accesible, incluso para principiantes.


En esta formación, encontrarás:

  • Demostraciones concretas: Ejemplos prácticos y casos de uso.

  • Fichas técnicas y guías prácticas: Material descargable para facilitar tu aprendizaje.

[Actualización: He añadido videos sobre el uso del modelo GPT4o que sucede a la versión GPT4]

En resumen, estás a punto de iniciar un curso claro, accesible y atractivo. Está diseñado para cubrir los conceptos esenciales sin extenderse demasiado, ofreciendo el equilibrio perfecto. No importa tu nivel inicial, ya seas principiante o busques técnicas avanzadas, esta es la única formación que necesitarás para dominar ChatGPT.


Mi presentación:

Me llamo Yassine, soy el fundador de una organización de formación que ha ayudado a miles de estudiantes a alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales. Soy un apasionado de la tecnología. Después de obtener un máster en finanzas y adquirir experiencia en consultoría y fondos de inversión, me formé en desarrollo web y dediqué cientos de horas a descubrir y utilizar IA. Hoy quiero transmitirte, de la manera más clara posible, todo lo que he aprendido en estos últimos años.


Certificación y garantía:

  • Al completar esta formación, recibirás una certificación que podrás compartir en LinkedIn.

  • Esta formación es sin riesgo, ya que cuentas con una garantía de "satisfacción o reembolso" de 30 días.

  • Tendrás acceso de por vida a la formación y a los recursos descargables.

Estás a un clic de dominar una tecnología extremadamente útil que te hará más eficiente, más productivo y, simplemente, indispensable. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en IA!



Detalle de las diferentes secciones de este curso:


Introducción rápida a ChatGPT

Descubre cómo dominar rápidamente ChatGPT en solo unos pocos videos. Sumérgete en su interfaz intuitiva y aprende a crear tus primeros comandos para aprovechar al máximo el poder de la IA. Ya sea para generar tablas, hacer lluvias de ideas, generar nuevas ideas, traducir y corregir textos, o redactar diversos contenidos, serás más rápido y eficiente con la IA. Descubre cómo ChatGPT puede asistirte en tu búsqueda de empleo y adaptarse a tus necesidades profesionales para aumentar tu eficacia. Verás que ChatGPT es capaz de crear una multitud de contenidos, desde correos y cartas hasta artículos y publicaciones para redes sociales, sin olvidar la redacción de código informático.

Fundamentos del prompt engineering

Aprende por qué el prompt engineering es esencial y cómo puede transformar a ChatGPT en un verdadero experto. Comprende la importancia del contexto y los objetivos para estructurar tus interacciones, y descubre cómo ajustar el formato y la temperatura para optimizar tus comandos y variar el nivel de creatividad del modelo. Personaliza tus interacciones dominando el tono y el estilo, y benefíciate de 5 consejos prácticos para obtener respuestas aún más pertinentes de ChatGPT.

Técnicas avanzadas de prompt engineering

En esta sección, veremos cómo crear comandos que generen otros comandos. Estudiaremos la metodología de reverse engineering, las funcionalidades de búsqueda web, la interpretación de imágenes y muchas otras técnicas avanzadas.

Dall-e

Continuaremos con la generación de imágenes con Dall-e. Verás cómo pasar de un resultado promedio a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, cómo modificar de manera simple y rápida porciones de imágenes y optimizar tus resultados. También estudiaremos técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán, por ejemplo, crear una continuidad en la generación de un personaje de ficción o cómic, para obtener resultados aún más impresionantes.

Soluciones a las limitaciones de ChatGPT y la IA

ChatGPT y otros modelos de inteligencia artificial tienen límites y debilidades. En esta sección, exploraremos cuáles son y cómo superarlas.

Funcionalidades interesantes en ChatGPT

Aprende a configurar las funcionalidades de compartir tus conversaciones para un uso colaborativo de ChatGPT. Aprovecha al máximo la aplicación móvil de ChatGPT explorando todas las opciones que ofrece. Finalmente, descubre métodos para crear contenido único con la IA evitando cualquier forma de plagio o contenido duplicado.

Copilot y Bing

Copilot ofrece varias alternativas interesantes a las funcionalidades avanzadas y de pago de ChatGPT. Veremos cómo aprovechar la colaboración entre Microsoft y OpenAI para acceder a funcionalidades avanzadas de inteligencia artificial integradas en el motor de búsqueda Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral y otros

En la continuidad de la sección anterior, estudiaremos otras IA como Gemini de Google o Claude de Anthropic. Veremos sus fortalezas, debilidades y analizaremos varios casos de uso para saber en qué situaciones es preferible utilizarlas en lugar de ChatGPT.

Instrucciones personalizadas en ChatGPT

Adapta ChatGPT a tus necesidades y expectativas. Aprende a personalizar tus interacciones configurando tus instrucciones personalizadas. Descubre también los puntos de precaución a considerar para un uso óptimo.

Los GPTs

Descubre el funcionamiento de los GPTs, esas mini aplicaciones hiperespecializadas que a veces pueden superar a ChatGPT. Aprende a crear tu propio GPT paso a paso. Domina las llamadas a la API para maximizar las capacidades de ChatGPT y descubre al final de esta sección cómo monetizar tus GPTs y, en general, cómo ganar dinero gracias a ChatGPT.

Gestión de API y Playground

Explora el playground de ChatGPT y descubre las nuevas funcionalidades que ofrece. Aprende a hacer llamadas a la API de ChatGPT con niveles de dificultad crecientes. Así, podrás utilizar ChatGPT fuera de la interfaz, crear un chatbot en otro sitio o incluso integrar ChatGPT en otros software como Google Sheets o Excel, por ejemplo.
targetAudiences: A cualquier persona que desee dominar la IA y ChatGPT. Esta formación es para todos los niveles.

courseDetails.title: Caregiving: Comprehensive Health and Social Care Diploma
courseDetails.shortDescription: Become a Caregiving Professional in Healthcare and Learn Standard Safeguarding Practices
courseDetails.longDescription:
Advance your career in healthcare and caregiving with our comprehensive Caregiving: Health and Social Care Diploma Course. This course equips you with the essential knowledge required for a successful career in the health and social care sector. Covering healthcare management, effective communication, safeguarding, and risk management, this course prepares you for various roles in healthcare and caregiving environments.

Learn about the fundamentals of health and social care, effective communication techniques in caregiving, and the rights and responsibilities of caregivers. This course also emphasizes the promotion of equality and diversity within care environments. Gain expertise in safeguarding vulnerable adults, managing health and safety, and conducting risk assessments. Whether you are an aspiring healthcare professional or looking to enhance your current skills as a caregiver, this course offers a thorough understanding of health and social care, preparing you for certification and career growth.

By completing this course, you will be well-prepared to take on roles that require a deep understanding of healthcare practices and caregiving responsibilities. Join us to advance your career and make a significant impact in the health and social care industry.

Course Curriculum:

Introduction to Health and Social Care Gain a foundational understanding of the health and social care sector. Learn about the differences between healthcare and social care, who provides these services, and why pursuing a career in this field is valuable.

Communication and Its Relevance Explore the necessity of effective communication in caregiving and health and social care settings. Understand different forms of communication, types of interpersonal interaction, and strategies for overcoming communication barriers.

Rights and Responsibilities as a Health and Social Care Worker Learn about the roles and responsibilities of health and social care workers, ways to improve service quality, and the importance of reflective practice. Understand your rights as a caregiver and how to handle conflicting responsibilities.

Role as a Caregiver and Healthcare Professional Delve into the values promoted by health and social care workers. Understand the expectations and boundaries of a caregiver's role, codes of conduct, and the advantages of working in partnerships within the healthcare profession.

Working in Health and Social Care: Promoting Equality, Diversity, and Rights Understand the concepts of equality, diversity, and rights in health and social care settings. Learn how to actively promote these values and recognize the effects of discriminatory practices.

Important Principles and Policies in Health and Social Care Work Familiarize yourself with the legal responsibilities, duties, and principles in health and social care. Learn about consent for care or treatment, handling complaints, and the relevant laws and regulations.

Safeguarding Vulnerable Adults Learn the principles of safeguarding vulnerable adults, recognizing forms of exploitation and abuse, and understanding factors contributing to vulnerability. Gain knowledge on safeguarding directives, training, and identifying signs of abuse.

Health and Safety Responsibilities Understand the potential hazards in health and social care environments and how to manage them. Learn about hazardous substances, health and safety management, and the roles and responsibilities involved in maintaining a safe care environment.

Risk Management in Health and Social Care Explore the principles of risk management in health and social care. Learn about risk assessment, evaluating and managing risks positively, and the importance of maintaining a risk register for effective care delivery.

FAQ

1. What does Caregiving: Health and Social Care Course cover?

Answer: Health and Social Care includes services that support individuals' health, well-being, and social needs, providing essential care in various settings like homes, hospitals, and communities.

2. Do I need qualifications to enroll in Health and Social Care?

Answer: No prior qualifications are required to begin learning. This course provides foundational knowledge that can help you get started or enhance your skills in the Health and Social Care field.

3. What are the job prospects for caregivers?

Answer: Caregivers can work in roles such as support workers and healthcare assistants. In the U.S., salaries typically range from $22,000 to $36,000 per year, depending on location and experience.

4. How can this course help me in a caregiving role?

Answer: This course provides valuable insights into patient care, communication, and safeguarding. The certificate can be used to demonstrate your skills in the caregiving field.

5. Is this course flexible with my schedule?

Answer: Yes, the course is self-paced, allowing you to learn at your convenience and fit your studies around your existing commitments.

Whether you are an aspiring caregiver or a current healthcare professional, this comprehensive diploma prepares you for a rewarding career. Enroll now to make a significant impact in caregiving and healthcare.
targetAudiences: Aspiring healthcare professionals seeking comprehensive certification in caregiving
Current caregivers wanting to enhance their skills and knowledge in healthcare and social care
Nursing students, healthcare administrators, and social care workers
Individuals interested in healthcare management, safeguarding, and risk management
Anyone pursuing a career in health and social care, particularly in caregiving roles

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka: kapsamlı yapay zeka eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Yapay Zekayı Öğrenin: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - yapay zeka hakkında kapsamlı rehber
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka Eğitimi:

Her güne, görevlerinizi benzersiz bir hız ve hassasiyetle yerine getirebilecek son derece yetenekli bir kişisel asistanla başlamak ister misiniz? E-postalarınızı, makalelerinizi veya raporlarınızı yazabilen, ilham verici görseller üretebilen, karmaşık verileri analiz edebilen, özel çözümler kodlayabilen ve çeşitli sorunları çözebilen bir yapay zeka ile çalışarak, gerçekten önemli olan konulara odaklanabilirsiniz.

Ancak, bu avantajlardan tam anlamıyla yararlanabilmek için yapay zekayı derinlemesine anlamak önemlidir. Pek çok kişi birkaç komut verip, yapay zekanın gerçek potansiyelini keşfetmeden süreci yarıda bırakıyor. Bunun arkasında genellikle, yapay zekadan en iyi sonuçları almanızı sağlayacak teknikler, yöntemler ve ince ayarlar hakkında bilgi eksikliği bulunur.

Bu eğitimin amacı, yapay zeka ile etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilmeniz, onu en iyi şekilde yapılandırmanız ve tam potansiyelinden faydalanmanız için size gerekli tüm araçları sunmaktır.

Bu hedefe ulaşmak için, yapay zekayı optimize ederek kullanmanız gereken temel bilgi ve becerileri kazanmanızı sağlayacak kapsamlı ve dinamik bir eğitim hazırladım.

Bu eğitim süresince birlikte şunları öğreneceğiz:

  • En iyi sonuçları almak için yapay zekaya nasıl net sorular sorulur.

  • ChatGPT'yi güvenilir öğretmeniniz, iş ortağınız veya analiz uzmanınız haline getirecek şekilde nasıl yapılandırılır.

  • Çalışmalarınızda daha üretken, hızlı, anlamlı ve etkili olmak için nasıl çeşitli fikirler üretebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin çok yönlü kullanımından tam olarak faydalanmak için ona nasıl yazılır, nasıl konuşulur, nasıl dinlenir, ona görseller nasıl gönderilir ve nasıl yorumlanması istenir.

  • Dall-e veya Copilot'u en iyi görselleri üretmeleri için nasıl yönlendirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin ücretli sürümüne alternatif olarak hangi ilginç seçenekleri değerlendirebilirsiniz.

  • Copilot, Claude veya Gemini gibi diğer yapay zeka araçlarını da keşfedeceğiz.

  • ChatGPT'yi özel ihtiyaçlarınıza ve tercihinize göre nasıl özelleştirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'yi GPT’lerle nasıl güçlendirebileceğimizi göreceğiz: Bu uygulamaları nasıl kullanacağınızı ve hatta geliştirici olmadan nasıl oluşturabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Eğitimin sonunda, API yönetimi, Playground, ChatGPT’nin Excel veya Google Sheets gibi yazılımlara entegrasyonu gibi daha teknik konuları da ele alacağız.

  • Ve en önemlisi, tüm bunların başlangıç seviyesindeki kişiler için bile erişilebilir olduğunu göreceğiz.

Bu eğitimde şunları bulacaksınız:

  • Pratik ve somut gösterimler.

  • İndirilebilir teknik bilgiler ve pratik kılavuzlar.

[Güncelleme: GPT-4'ün yerini alan GPT-4o modelinin kullanımına dair videolar ekledim]

Kısacası, açık, erişilebilir ve ilgi çekici bir kursa başlamak üzeresiniz. Gerekli kavramları detaylı bir şekilde ele alan, ancak gereksiz uzunluğa kaçmayan bu eğitim, ChatGPT'yi tam anlamıyla öğrenmeniz için ihtiyacınız olan tek kaynak olacak. Başlangıç seviyeniz ne olursa olsun, ister yeni başlıyor olun ister ileri düzey teknikler arıyor olun, bu kurs size hitap edecek.


Tanıtımım:

Adım Yassine Rochd, binlerce öğrencinin profesyonel hedeflerine ulaşmasına yardımcı olan bir eğitim kuruluşunun kurucusuyum.

Teknolojiye büyük bir tutku duyuyorum. Finans alanında yüksek lisans yaptıktan ve danışmanlık ile yatırım fonları alanında deneyim kazandıktan sonra, web geliştirme konusunda eğitim aldım ve yüzlerce saatimi yapay zekayı keşfetmeye ve kullanmaya adadım.

Bugün, son birkaç yılda öğrendiklerimi size en anlaşılır şekilde aktarmayı hedefliyorum.


Sertifikasyon ve Garanti:

  • Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda, LinkedIn'de bile paylaşabileceğiniz bir sertifika alacaksınız.

  • Eğitimimiz risksizdir; çünkü 30 günlük "memnuniyet garantisi" sunuyoruz.

  • Ayrıca, eğitime ve indirilebilir kaynaklara ömür boyu erişim hakkınız olacak.

Sizi daha etkili, daha üretken ve vazgeçilmez kılacak bu son derece faydalı teknolojiyi öğrenmek için sadece bir tık uzaktasınız.


Kursun Bölüm Detayları:

ChatGPT'ye Hızlı Başlangıç:

ChatGPT'yi yalnızca birkaç video ile hızla öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin sezgisel arayüzüne adım atın ve yapay zekanın gücünü tam anlamıyla kullanabilmek için ilk komutlarınızı nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. Tablo oluşturmadan beyin fırtınasına, fikir üretmeden metin çevirisi ve düzeltmeye kadar çeşitli içerikler oluşturmak için ChatGPT ile daha hızlı ve verimli olacaksınız. ChatGPT'nin iş arayışınızda size nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini ve profesyonel ihtiyaçlarınıza uyum sağlayarak verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfedin. ChatGPT'nin e-postalar ve mektuplardan makalelere ve sosyal medya paylaşımlarına, hatta yazılım kodlamasına kadar birçok içerik oluşturma yeteneğine sahip olduğunu göreceksiniz.


Prompt Engineering'in Temelleri

Prompt engineering'in önemini ve ChatGPT'yi gerçek bir uzmana dönüştürme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Etkileşimlerinizi yapılandırmak için bağlamın ve hedeflerin rolünü anlayın; en iyi sonuçları elde etmek için format ve sıcaklık ayarlarını nasıl optimize edeceğinizi öğrenin. Ton ve stil kontrolü ile etkileşimlerinizi kişiselleştirin ve ChatGPT'den daha alakalı yanıtlar alabilmeniz için 5 pratik ipucunu uygulayın.


İleri Düzey Prompt Engineering Teknikleri

Bu bölümde, kendi kendine yeni promptlar üretebilen promptlar oluşturmayı öğreneceğiz. Reverse engineering (tersine mühendislik), web arama işlevleri, görüntü yorumlama teknikleri ve diğer birçok ileri düzey tekniği derinlemesine inceleyeceğiz.


Dall-e

Dall-e ile görsel oluşturma sürecine adım atacağız. Orta düzeydeki bir sonuçtan estetik ve ilham verici eserlere nasıl geçiş yapabileceğinizi, görüntülerin belirli bölümlerini basit ve hızlı bir şekilde nasıl değiştirebileceğinizi ve sonuçlarınızı nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bir çizgi roman ya da kurgusal karakterin sürekliliğini yaratmanıza olanak tanıyan ileri düzey teknikleri inceleyerek daha etkileyici sonuçlar elde edebileceksiniz.


ChatGPT ve Yapay Zekanın Sınırlarına Çözümler

ChatGPT ve diğer yapay zeka modellerinin belirli sınırlamaları ve zayıflıkları vardır. Bu bölümde, bu sınırlamaların neler olduğunu ve bunları nasıl aşabileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


ChatGPT'deki İlginç Özellikler

ChatGPT'yi işbirlikçi bir şekilde kullanabilmek için sohbetlerinizi paylaşma özelliklerini nasıl yapılandıracağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT mobil uygulamasını en iyi şekilde kullanmak için sunduğu tüm seçenekleri keşfedin. Son olarak, yapay zeka ile benzersiz içerikler oluşturmanın ve her türlü intihal veya kopya içerikten kaçınmanın yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Copilot ve Bing

Copilot, ChatGPT'nin ücretli ve gelişmiş özelliklerine birkaç ilginç alternatif sunar. Microsoft ve OpenAI iş birliği sayesinde, Bing arama motoruna entegre edilmiş ileri düzey yapay zeka özelliklerine nasıl erişebileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral ve Diğerleri

Bir önceki bölümün devamı olarak, Google'ın Gemini'si veya Anthropic'in Claude'u gibi diğer yapay zeka modellerini inceleyeceğiz. Bu modellerin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini değerlendirerek, hangi durumlarda ChatGPT yerine tercih edilebileceklerini göreceğiz.


ChatGPT Özel Talimatları (Custom Instructions)

ChatGPT'yi ihtiyaçlarınıza ve beklentilerinize göre nasıl özelleştireceğinizi öğrenin. Özel talimatlarınızı yapılandırarak etkileşimlerinizi nasıl kişiselleştirebileceğinizi keşfedin ve optimum kullanım için göz önünde bulundurmanız gereken önemli noktaları öğrenin.


GPT'ler

Bazı durumlarda ChatGPT'yi bile geride bırakabilen, son derece uzmanlaşmış mini uygulamalar olan GPT'lerin nasıl çalıştığını keşfedin. Kendi GPT'nizi adım adım nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin yeteneklerini en üst düzeye çıkarmak için API çağrılarını nasıl yöneteceğinizi öğrenecek ve bölümün sonunda GPT'lerinizi nasıl paraya çevirebileceğinizi ve genel olarak ChatGPT ile nasıl gelir elde edebileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.


API Yönetimi ve Playground

ChatGPT'nin Playground'unu keşfedin ve sunduğu yeni özellikleri öğrenin. Artan zorluk seviyelerinde ChatGPT API'sine nasıl çağrı yapacağınızı öğrenin. Böylece ChatGPT'yi arayüz dışında kullanabilir, başka bir siteye chatbot yerleştirebilir veya ChatGPT'yi Google Sheets veya Excel gibi diğer yazılımlara entegre edebilirsiniz.
targetAudiences: Yapay zeka ve ChatGPT'yi öğrenmek isteyen herkes için, seviyeniz ne olursa olsun.

courseDetails.title: 财务建模：Excel 中的完整财务课程 - 金融
courseDetails.shortDescription: Excel 财务建模实践案例和培训 - Excel 上的商业计划、估值和财务建模 - 金融
courseDetails.longDescription:
如果您对金融行业感兴趣，比如私募股权、并购、财务控制或财务管理，您必须已经意识到财务建模是这些领域中的一个关键技能。

无论您是在制定商业计划、财务报告还是进行公司估值，您都需要掌握这项技能。

这门关于 Excel 财务建模的综合课程将提供知识、技能和最佳实践，让您能够创建清晰、结构良好的 Excel 模型，满足投资银行、私募股权基金和财务管理团队的期望。

在本次培训中，您将学习财务建模的标准和实现专业结果所需遵循的规则。

您将学习如何设计一种包含多种投资情景的综合财务模型、含有多个融资层次和不同特征的债务时间表、清晰的资金来源与用途表、专业的商业计划，以及基于可比交易的规范 EBITDA 的公司估值模型。最后，我们将计算投资的内部收益率（IRR）并根据投资退出的参数对其进行敏感性分析。

当然，如果您对这些概念还不太熟悉，我们将在开始 Excel 财务建模之前先解释这些概念。

本课程覆盖了财务控制、财务分析或交易职业（私募股权、并购、TS）感兴趣的人必须掌握的金融基础知识。
targetAudiences: 对企业融资领域中的竞争激烈领域感兴趣的金融学生，例如私募股权、风险投资、并购、杠杆融资、ECM、交易服务、重组、估值，当然还有财务建模
准备金融面试并练习基于 Excel 的财务建模案例的候选人
企业财务实习生寻求提高财务、财务建模和 Excel 方面的技能
企业财务初级分析师
旨在通过 Excel 提高财务建模熟练程度的高级财务分析师

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA: Formação Completa em Inteligência Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domine o ChatGPT, IA e a Engenharia de Prompt: Chat GPT, Dall-e, Copilot | O curso essencial de inteligência artificial
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

[Atualização: Adicionei vídeos sobre o uso do modelo GPT-4o, que sucede a versão GPT-4]

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Minha apresentação:

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs
